title: Taking aim at Boeing, Airbus opens first US plantEuropean jetmaker Airbus inaugurated its first US plant Monday in a ...
content: Taking aim at Boeing, Airbus opens first US plantEuropean jetmaker Airbus inaugurated its first US plant Monday in a move to wrest away a chunk of rival Boeing's domination of the domestic aircraft market, including lucrative Pentagon contracts. - Dubai Airshow News Today - EIN News
